name: CHAT_PARTICIPANT_GROUPS
description: Table for Unified Communication groups in a conversation that a chat user is a part of. To extract data to CHAT_PARTICIPANT_GROUPS: 1. In Clinical Administration, open EMR System Definitions and select Note, Trans, Communication. 2. Go to the Secure Chat Clarity Settings screen. 3. In the Enable Clarity extraction for Secure Chat conversations field, enter 1-Yes.

columns.name: CONVERSATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the secure chat conversation record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: USER_IN_UC_GROUP_ID
columns.description: Used to keep track of which groups in a conversation include the user.
